articles.title: Will bring new treatment options in prostate, breast and renal cancers, says Glenmark’s Alok Malik - Moneycontrol
articles.description: On World Cancer Day, Alok Malik, Head of India formulations business, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals, tells Moneycontrol that the company is committed to improving access to quality cancer care
